alert.note: Alert for Lower Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 01 at 1:10PM AKST until January 03 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON AKST MONDAY FOR THE KUSKOKWIM VALLEY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Valley, including Sleetmute and Lime Village. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest wind chills are expected with any period of stronger winds, especially between Aniak, Sleetmute, and Lime Village.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
